Name: Fairytale Figurine: Scattering Blossoms
Desc: An origami flower ball model so seemingly delicate that it might burst if touched. Can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nThe vivid flower ball is a great target for use during flight. In fairytales, the flying squirrels flew between just such targets to conquer the streaming wind, eventually carving out a corner of the skies for themselves.
